trans-unit.source: To start developing your cloud applications that consume Azure AD Graph, you need to make sure you met the following prerequisites:
trans-unit.target: To start developing your cloud applications that consume Azure AD Graph, you need to make sure you met the following prerequisites:

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>An Internet connection</embeddedLabel>: Azure AD Graph requires internet connectivity.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>An Internet connection</embeddedLabel>: Azure AD Graph requires internet connectivity.

trans-unit.source: <system>Azure Subscription</system>: You need to have a valid Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: <system>Azure Subscription</system>: You need to have a valid Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: You can get a one-month free trial here: <externalLink><linkText>Azure Free Trial</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/free-trial/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: You can get a one-month free trial here: <externalLink><linkText>Azure Free Trial</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/pricing/free-trial/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Azure AD Tenant Permissions to Access Directory Data</embeddedLabel>: In order to call the Graph API against a directory tenant in Azure AD, a user or tenant administrator must grant access.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Azure AD Tenant Permissions to Access Directory Data</embeddedLabel>: In order to call the Graph API against a directory tenant in Azure AD, a user or tenant administrator must grant access.

trans-unit.source: For more information about granting access, see <legacyLink xlink:href="b08d91fa-6a64-4deb-92f4-f5857add9ed8#BKMK_Graph" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Accessing the Graph API</legacyLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about granting access, see <legacyLink xlink:href="b08d91fa-6a64-4deb-92f4-f5857add9ed8#BKMK_Graph" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Accessing the Graph API</legacyLink>.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>Azure AD Graph Code Samples (Optional)</embeddedLabel>: While it is not required, we highly recommend downloading the sample applications that demonstrate the capabilities of the Azure AD Graph API.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>Azure AD Graph Code Samples (Optional)</embeddedLabel>: While it is not required, we highly recommend downloading the sample applications that demonstrate the capabilities of the Azure AD Graph API.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the code samples available for Azure AD Graph, see <legacyLink xlink:href="bc8af4ff-66e7-4d5b-b3d4-c33d2c55d270#BKMK_Graph" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Calling Azure AD Graph API</legacyLink> in the <link xlink:href="bc8af4ff-66e7-4d5b-b3d4-c33d2c55d270" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Active Directory Code Samples</link> topic.
trans-unit.target: For more information about the code samples available for Azure AD Graph, see <legacyLink xlink:href="bc8af4ff-66e7-4d5b-b3d4-c33d2c55d270#BKMK_Graph" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Calling Azure AD Graph API</legacyLink> in the <link xlink:href="bc8af4ff-66e7-4d5b-b3d4-c33d2c55d270" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Azure Active Directory Code Samples</link> topic.

trans-unit.source: <system>Microsoft Azure Active Directory Windows PowerShell Cmdlets (Optional)</system>: The Azure AD Windows PowerShell Cmdlets can be used by an administrator to perform administrative tasks on Azure AD directory entities.
trans-unit.target: <system>Microsoft Azure Active Directory Windows PowerShell Cmdlets (Optional)</system>: The Azure AD Windows PowerShell Cmdlets can be used by an administrator to perform administrative tasks on Azure AD directory entities.

trans-unit.source: For example, an administrator can use these cmdlets to manage their tenant's users, service principals, and domains.
trans-unit.target: For example, an administrator can use these cmdlets to manage their tenant's users, service principals, and domains.

trans-unit.source: While it is not a strict requirement to install the cmdlets to use Azure AD Graph, if you will be managing service principals you can use these cmdlets to do so.
trans-unit.target: While it is not a strict requirement to install the cmdlets to use Azure AD Graph, if you will be managing service principals you can use these cmdlets to do so.

trans-unit.source: Also, many of the how-to procedures in this documentation create a user in your tenant's directory and you may find the Azure AD cmdlets helpful in removing the user after running the examples.
trans-unit.target: Also, many of the how-to procedures in this documentation create a user in your tenant's directory and you may find the Azure AD cmdlets helpful in removing the user after running the examples.

trans-unit.source: For more information about these cmdlets, see the following topic: <externalLink><linkText>Azure AD PowerShell Cmdlets</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=294151</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: For more information about these cmdlets, see the following topic: <externalLink><linkText>Azure AD PowerShell Cmdlets</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=294151</linkUri></externalLink>
